mock_responses.query: Show me total sales by region
mock_responses.answer: Looking at the processed dataset, the North America region lead overall sales strongly, contributing $1.5M compared to the $800K from Europe. This represents nearly a 2x multiple between the top two regions.
mock_responses.sql: SELECT region, SUM(sales) as sales FROM dataset GROUP BY region ORDER BY sales DESC;

executive_summary.key_finding: North America aggressively dominates total revenue generation across the entire dataset.
executive_summary.recommended_action: Allocate additional targeted marketing spend to Europe and Asia to close the vast geographic performance gap.
